steps.name: When I click on the login button
Then I should see login Page
When I click on the link CREATE NEW ACCOUNT
Then I should see the Registration Page
When I enter invalid credentials of "John", "Doe12", "jane@domain.com", "Password123#", "Password123#"
And I select the desired target and preferred options
And I click on the Create an Account button
Then the following inline errors should be displayed: "lastName: Last name must contain only letters, spaces, apostrophes, or hyphens"

parameters.name: Error_message
parameters.value: lastName: Last name must contain only letters, spaces, apostrophes, or hyphens
